name: Escape Agent (itch)
description:
INSTRUCTION :

As agent, you has to memorise the level within the time given . you will ve rewinded every time the timer ends.

Use WASD to move. Find the way out before the timer goes out or else you will be rewinded. use every time to memorise levels to find the way out.

This is My first Game I ever built. I built it for Brackets Game Jam - 4 with the theme  "rewind" in 7 days . Even though My game not throughly follow the theme, I just do it for encourages myself to build my first game and yeah I did it.

So, dont expect it to be good , it has a lot of bugs that I dont know how to solve it :0 , feel free to leave comments on what needed to be improved in my games. THANKS !
